symf.name: TH32CS_INHERIT
symf.desc: the snapshot handle is to be inheritable

symc.name: TH32CS_SNAPALL
symc.desc: Includes all processes and threads in the system, plus the heaps and modules of the process specified in th32ProcessID. Equivalent to specifying the TH32CS_SNAPHEAPLIST, TH32CS_SNAPMODULE, TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, and TH32CS_SNAPTHREAD values combined using an OR operation ('|').

symf.name: TH32CS_SNAPHEAPLIST
symf.desc: Includes all heaps of the process specified in th32ProcessID in the snapshot.

symf.name: TH32CS_SNAPMODULE
symf.desc: Includes all modules of the process specified in th32ProcessID in the snapshot

symf.name: TH32CS_SNAPMODULE32
symf.desc: Includes all 32-bit modules of the process specified in th32ProcessID in the snapshot when called from a 64-bit process.

symf.name: TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS
symf.desc: Includes all processes in the system in the snapshot.

symf.name: TH32CS_SNAPTHREAD
symf.desc: Includes all threads in the system in the snapshot
